sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios" import { SubmitHandler, useForm } from "react-hook-form" import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" export const UpdateTrainForm=()=>{ interface TrainForm{ sorozat: number becenev: string gyarto: string maxSebesseg: number } const location=useLocation() const {register,formState: {errors},handleSubmit,reset} = useForm({mode: 'onTouched'}) const onSubmit: SubmitHandler = (data: any)=>{ axios.put('http://localhost:8080/trains/train',{sorozat: data.sorozat,becenev: data.becenev, gyarto: data.gyarto, maxSebesseg: data.maxSebesseg}) .then(function (response:any){ reset() }) .catch(function (error:any){ alert(error.message) }) } return(
{errors.sorozat?.message}
{errors.becenev?.message}
{errors.gyarto?.message}
{errors.maxSebesseg?.message}
) }
